text: يُثَبِّتُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ ٱلثَّابِتِ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ وَيُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَۚ وَيَفۡعَلُ ٱللَّهُ مَا يَشَآءُ
translation: 27.Yalli yeemene mara nummâ maxcoy (laa ilaaha ilia kinnuk) diggi ittat diggi ken haa addunyâ manoo kee akeerâ manol, Yalli koroosite mara addunyaa kee akeeral inkih cakki gitak makot ken beya, Yalli isih faxam aba yeemene mara tirri haah, koroosite mara makkoysaamal.
